affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
attrib:
BANISH DURATION: 2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5
ILLUSION DURATION: 5/6/7/8
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 30%/40%/50%/60%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 150%/150%/150%/150%
cmb:
120/120/120/120
25/22/19/16
lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
name: shadow_demon_disruption

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Pure
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Curses a random enemy in an area to take increased damage.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
cmb:
50/60/70/80
13
lore: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
name: shadow_demon_soul_catcher

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
notes: Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.
attrib:
STACK DAMAGE: 20/35/50/65
MAX STACKS TO MULTIPLY: 5
RADIUS: 190
DURATION: 10/10/10/10
cmb:
40
2.75
lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
name: shadow_demon_shadow_poison

desc: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.
cmb: 1
name: shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Demonic Purge will slow Spell Immune units.
attrib:
DURATION: 5/5/5
SCEPTER CHARGE RESTORE TIME: 40
cmb:
200/200/200
50
lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
name: shadow_demon_demonic_purge
